net.floodlightcontroller.core.util

类 ListenerDispatcher<U,T extends IListener<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.util.ListenerDispatcher<U,T>

  • public class ListenerDispatcher<U,T extends IListener<U>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintain lists of listeners ordered by dependency.

    readams
